original_text: In the Bible, God said to Abraham, ‘I have chosen you to become the ancestor of many different people.’ That is what God himself promises, because Abraham believed in him. God is the one who causes dead people to become alive again. He speaks about things that are not yet there as if they were already there. 4: See Genesis 17:5. In the Bible, God said to Abraham, ‘I have chosen you to become the ancestor of many different people.’ That is what God himself promises, because Abraham believed in him. God is the one who causes dead people to become alive again. He speaks about things that are not yet there as if they were already there.
korean_text: 기록된 바 내가 너를 많은 민족의 조상으로 세웠다 하심과 같으니 그가 믿은 바 하나님은 죽은 자를 살리시며 없는 것을 있는 것으로 부르시는 이시니라

sentences.original_text: In the Bible, God said to Abraham
I have chosen you to become the ancestor
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 조상이 되게 하기 위해 선택했다

sentences.original_text: That is what God himself promises
God is the one who causes dead people
He speaks about things that are not yet there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아직 존재하지 않는 것들에 대해 말씀하시며

sentences.original_text: as if they were already there
